system.description:
Trigger: You are hit by a [X-Strike] Attack. 
Effect: The triggering attack fails to hit you, and additional X-Strike attacks that hit you and allied creatures within 4m also fail to hit until your next activation, or when the round ends, whichever is first. attacks failing to hit you do not activate on-miss effects.
